HiddenText.Name: What do we talk about, and how much preparation is required before each visit appointment?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What do we talk about, and how much preparation is required before each visit appointment?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: English speakers/volunteers should not need to prepare material or discussion topics. The English-learning students have an assignment for each visit, which includes discussion questions and language practice activities related to the course topics that they are studying during the corresponding week. The students are expected to come prepared and to lead the discussions. You will see each assignment on the website and you can briefly review the topics/activities prior to each session to anticipate questions.
